name: Jingle Jam 2019 - A Gift of Dirt
name_original: Jingle Jam 2019 - A Gift of Dirt
description:
A Gift of Dirt  V1.0

===== CONTROLS =====

MOVEMENT: ARROW KEYS

===== BACKSTORY =====

IT IS THE YEAR 2019, YOU ARE IN THE MIDDLE OF JINGLE JAM , ENJOYING THE STREAMS AND CONTENT PROVIDED BY THE YOGSCAST.

HOWEVER, THERE IS A STRONG DESIRE TO GIVE BACK.  THE HOLIDAY SPIRIT HAS BROUGHT ALONG THE NEED TO GIVE BACK.  YOU HEED THE CALL TO GIVE IN ANY WAY THAT YOU CAN, EITHER THROUGH DONATIONS, EFFORT, OR GIVING OF GIFTS. 

Optional Modifiers: 

- 2 Girls 1 CPU
